column1: Uchi////In addition to the sushi menu we also tried the foie gras nagiri which was very flavorful and a great way to end our meal.  We sat at the sushi bar and the chef also made us a special roll that was amazing.  The staff was super prompt
column2: and the sushi chef really guided us through our experience.  This was honestly one of the few times in my life I was bragging to friends and family about my meal as I was eating it.  I can't wait to eat here again.
